Text: Shipman and WhaleyHodge I spoke briefly with Profs Shipman and Whaley Of course they always like to hear from former students so Ive included their relevant information Prof Shipman surprisingly does not use email so I have atelephone number If theyre interested may I provide them with theinformation from your business card Professor Douglas Whaley Professor Morgan Shipman Office Secretary Rm Drinko Hall W th Ave Columbus OH Gene Crawford Stebbins
